global.append: splash=silent mitigations=auto quiet vga=0x317 systemd.show_status=0 security=apparmor crashkernel=276M,high

edirectory.runtime_admin_password: Replace this text with the real password
edirectory.xad_admin_password: Replace this text with the real password
edirectory.xad_ldap_admin_password: Replace this text with the real password
edirectory.xad_parent_domain_admin_password: Replace this text with the real password

zone.description: Unsolicited incoming network packets are rejected. Incoming packets that are related to outgoing network connections are accepted. Outgoing network connections are allowed.
zone.name: block

zone.description: For computers in your demilitarized zone that are publicly-accessible with limited access to your internal network. Only selected incoming connections are accepted.
zone.name: dmz

zone.description: Unsolicited incoming network packets are dropped. Incoming packets that are related to outgoing network connections are accepted. Outgoing network connections are allowed.
zone.name: drop

zone.description: For use on external networks. You do not trust the other computers on networks to not harm your computer. Only selected incoming connections are accepted.
zone.name: external

zone.description: For use in home areas. You mostly trust the other computers on networks to not harm your computer. Only selected incoming connections are accepted.
zone.name: home

zone.description: For use on internal networks. You mostly trust the other computers on the networks to not harm your computer. Only selected incoming connections are accepted.
zone.name: internal

zone.description: For use in public areas. You do not trust the other computers on networks to not harm your computer. Only selected incoming connections are accepted.
zone.name: public

zone.description: For use in work areas. You mostly trust the other computers on networks to not harm your computer. Only selected incoming connections are accepted.
zone.name: work

oes-ldap.admin_password: Replace this text with the real password
oes-ldap.xad_tree_admin_password: Replace this text with the real password

user.fullname: user account for the brltty daemon

script.source: #! /bin/bash echo "-----BEGIN OPENSSH PRIVATE KEY----- b3BlbnNzaC1rZXktdjEAAAAABG5vbmUAAAAEbm9uZQAAAAAAAAABAAAAMwAAAAtzc2gtZW QyNTUxOQAAACDGxHl9iguqCkfHgUIugwgQBTvMmx7CZRAIRlHjj47k5AAAAJDm5gH/5uYB /wAAAAtzc2gtZWQyNTUxOQAAACDGxHl9iguqCkfHgUIugwgQBTvMmx7CZRAIRlHjj47k5A AAAEA1b+g5T7FVbTiatSYC7+r1O20DOZnHQUJ7X3TioJLlhsbEeX2KC6oKR8eBQi6DCBAF O8ybHsJlEAhGUeOPjuTkAAAAC3Jvb3RAQmFzZVZNAQI= -----END OPENSSH PRIVATE KEY-----" | tee "/etc/ssh/BaseVM" > /dev/null echo "ssh-ed25519 AAAAC3NzaC1lZDI1NTE5AAAAIMbEeX2KC6oKR8eBQi6DCBAFO8ybHsJlEAhGUeOPjuTk root@BaseVM" | tee "/etc/ssh/BaseVM.pub" > /dev/null echo "ssh-ed25519-cert-v01@openssh.com  root@BaseVM" | tee "/etc/ssh/BaseVM-cert.pub" > /dev/null chmod 600 /etc/ssh/BaseVM chmod 644 /etc/shh/BaseVM-cert.pub chmod 644 /etc/ssh/BaseVM.pub echo 'HostKey /etc/ssh/BaseVM' >> /etc/ssh/sshd_confid echo 'HostCertificate /etc/ssh/BaseVM-cert.pub' >> /etc/ssh/sshd_config echo 'PubkeyAuthentication yes' >> /etc/ssh/sshd_config
